content.prompt: Which of the following statements is true about this scenario?

choices.label: Her fear of the test is the conditioned response (CR).
The tapping of the pen is the unconditioned stimulus (UCS).
Her fear when she hears the tapping when there is no test is the conditioned response (CR).
A test in this class is the conditioned stimulus (CS).

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
